content: in this legal case the viru county court has ruled that the defendant is responsible for paying procedural costs of 360 euros the court has made a decision to satisfy a claim for defaulting on payments on behalf of the republic of estonia the common property will be divided between two parties referred to as sk and vk sk will become the sole owner of a specific property located in a certain district and county vk is obligated to make necessary entries in the land register for the property the court has ordered the removal of the joint owner entry in the land register identifying sk as the joint owner another person identified as k entered the land register as a joint owner but now wants to be the sole owner the court has decided to replace the previous declarations and allow k to be the sole owner k is also awarded financial compensation for the loss of the joint property and utility costs k is ordered to pay utility costs as well procedural costs are awarded to k the judgment is immediately enforceable and the defendant has the right to file an appeal within 30 days the text also provides information on how to pay necessary fees and request procedural assistance the background of the case is that k and vk were married and jointly owned a property k wants to divide the joint assets and liabilities and become the sole owner of the property the court has considered the evidence and made a default judgment in favor of k the court orders the deletion of the joint ownership entry in the land register and declares k as the sole owner financial compensation and utility costs are also awarded the court determines that the procedural costs should be borne by the defendant
